name: Mexican Potato Scramble
description: When I am looking for something savory and satisfying I make this Mexican potato scramble. I just substituted the egg with potatoes, and followed a very traditional recipe for making Mexican scrambled eggs.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Vegetable stock or potato water

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large pot with cold water and the diced potatoes. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, and let cook for about 6 minutes or until the potatoes are tender, but not mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a large pot with cold water and the diced potatoes. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, and let cook for about 6 minutes or until the potatoes are tender, but not mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: While the potatoes are cooking, heat a large sauté pan to medium-low heat and add the onion and serrano peppers. Cook the onion and peppers for 3-4 minutes or until the onion is tender and translucent. If the onion begins to stick add some water or vegetable stock to the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: While the potatoes are cooking, heat a large sauté pan to medium-low heat and add the onion and serrano peppers. Cook the onion and peppers for 3-4 minutes or until the onion is tender and translucent. If the onion begins to stick add some water or vegetable stock to the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced tomatoes to the pan and cook for about 6 minutes, or until the tomatoes begin to break down and become more of a sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the diced tomatoes to the pan and cook for about 6 minutes, or until the tomatoes begin to break down and become more of a sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the potatoes, but reserve 1/4 cup of the potato water.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the potatoes, but reserve 1/4 cup of the potato water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the potatoes and the potato water to the pan. Mix well and cook for 1 more minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the potatoes and the potato water to the pan. Mix well and cook for 1 more minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper and serve with warm corn tortillas and salsa.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with salt and pepper and serve with warm corn tortillas and salsa.

keywords: mexican potato scramble, vegan mexican potato scramble, vegan potato scramble
